title: NBFCs to assess new norms before exploring mergers & acquisitions - The Financial Express
content: NBFCs to assess new norms before exploring mergers & acquisitions  The Financial Express
description: If regulations for large NBFCs force a change, companies will adapt to follow them, Revankar said, adding that his company will not be looking for inorganic growth at this stage. “We are already carrying out an in-house merger between Shriram City Union and Shriram Transport,” he said.
